channel.title: C-Ptsd on The Sovereign Library
channel.description: Recent content in C-Ptsd on The Sovereign Library

item.title: Builder / Survivor Duality (Core Machinery)
item.description:
Summary: Two-mode operating system: Builder designs and deploys; Survivor runs 24/7 threat detection and can trigger lockout/freeze. Goal is not to kill either mode, but to become the System Admin who decides whose turn it is to drive.

Source: Raw Transcripts TXT: Batches 1–6 (Builder/Survivor model)

Notes

  • Keep this as a “card” unless you’re expanding with raw excerpts.
  • When expanding, add 1–3 concrete examples and link back to the relevant protocol.

item.title: Origin: Codex Born from C-PTSD Baseline
item.description:
Summary: Codex conceived night 05–06 Dec 2025: post-trauma analytical baseline crystallized the Builder identity and turned survival into engineered reconstruction.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batch 4

Context

Born from the aftermath of The Wipe, the Catalytic Crisis, and the realization that no one was coming. The default paths were closed by trauma, neglect, and systemic failure. The life that was supposed to be there, wasn’t.

Significance

This wasn’t philosophy — it was forged in December’s ice, pushing a frozen car, selling what was loved to survive.
